main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 9/22/60 involving a rapidly moving white light that disappeared while being observed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,The object moved rapidly back and forth,The object emitted no sound,It was not very large,The witness was asked about weather conditions and other details in a questionnaire.
witness description: Name and address are redacted; witness filled out a questionnaire regarding the sighting.
